languages.text: "Гало-устройство". {n}Хейнрикс резко протягивает руку и вынимает таинственный предмет из ваших пальцев.{/n} "Проклятое ксенотворение, которое искажает разум, а затем и тело своего обладателя. Объект общего указа Инквизиции о немедленном уничтожении. В данном вопросе мои полномочия превосходят ваши привилегии, Лорд-капитан".

"A Halo device." {n}Heinrix reaches out sharply and pries the mysterious object from your hand.{/n} "A cursed xenos creation that twists the mind, and soon the body, of its master. An item subject to the Inquisition's general decree of total annihilation. In this matter, my authority exceeds your privilege, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Гало-устройство". {n}Хейнрикс резко протягивает руку и вынимает таинственный предмет из ваших пальцев.{/n} "Проклятое ксенотворение, которое искажает разум, а затем и тело своего обладателя. Объект общего указа Инквизиции о немедленном уничтожении. В данном вопросе мои полномочия превосходят ваши привилегии, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "A Halo device." {n}Heinrichs reaches out sharply and pries the mysterious object out of your fingers.{/n} "A cursed xenos creation that twists the mind, and soon the body of its master. A subject of the Inquisition's general decree of total annihilation. In this matter, my authority exceeds your privilege, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

An item subject to the Inquisition's general decree of total annihilation. In this matter, my authority exceeds your privilege, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "A Halo device." {n}Heinrix reaches out sharply and pries the mysterious object from your hand.{/n} "A cursed xenos creation that twists the mind, and soon the body, of its master. An item subject to the Inquisition's general decree of total annihilation. In this matter, my authority exceeds your privilege, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “这是光晕装置。”{n}海因里希迅速伸出手来，从你手中夺过了神秘的造物。{/n}“这是遭到诅咒的异形造物，不仅可以扭曲佩戴者的思想，还会很快扭曲佩戴者的躯体。根据审判庭法令规定，这件造物必须彻底毁灭。在这件事情上，我的权力要高于你的特权，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "A Halo device." {n}Heinrix reaches out sharply and pries the mysterious object from your hand.{/n} "A cursed xenos creation that twists the mind, and soon the body, of its master. An item subject to the Inquisition's general decree of total annihilation. In this matter, my authority exceeds your privilege, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “这是光晕装置。”{n}海因里希迅速伸出手来，从你手中夺过了神秘的造物。{/n}“这是遭到诅咒的异形造物，不仅可以扭曲佩戴者的思想，还会很快扭曲佩戴者的躯体。根据审判庭法令规定，这件造物必须彻底毁灭。在这件事情上，我的权力要高于你的特权，舰长大人。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「光輪の装置」{n}ハインリックスが俊敏に手を伸ばし、あなたの手から不気味な装置を引き剥がす。{/n}「呪われた異種族の創造物です。持ち主の精神を、そしてすぐにその身体も歪める。異端審問庁の完全消滅命令の対象となる品目です。この件に関しては、我の権限が陛下の特権を超えるのです、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "A Halo device." {n}Heinrix reaches out sharply and pries the mysterious object from your hand.{/n} "A cursed xenos creation that twists the mind, and soon the body, of its master. An item subject to the Inquisition's general decree of total annihilation. In this matter, my authority exceeds your privilege, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「光輪の装置」{n}ハインリックスが俊敏に手を伸ばし、あなたの手から不気味な装置を引き剥がす。{/n}「呪われた異種族の創造物です。持ち主の精神を、そしてすぐにその身体も歪める。異端審問庁の完全消滅命令の対象となる品目です。この件に関しては、我の権限が陛下の特権を超えるのです、ロード・キャプテン」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Un artefact du Halo. » {n}Heinrix tend la main et vous arrache l'objet mystérieux.{/n} « Cette maudite création xénos pervertit l'esprit de son maître, puis rapidement aussi son corps. C'est un objet soumis au décret général de destruction totale de l'Inquisition. Dans ce cas, mon autorité surpasse vos privilèges, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "A Halo device." {n}Heinrix reaches out sharply and pries the mysterious object from your hand.{/n} "A cursed xenos creation that twists the mind, and soon the body, of its master. An item subject to the Inquisition's general decree of total annihilation. In this matter, my authority exceeds your privilege, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Un artefact du Halo. » {n}Heinrix tend la main et vous arrache l'objet mystérieux.{/n} « Cette maudite création xénos pervertit l'esprit de son maître, puis rapidement aussi son corps. C'est un objet soumis au décret général de destruction totale de l'Inquisition. Dans ce cas, mon autorité surpasse vos privilèges, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Un dispositivo Halo». {n}Heinrix extiende su mano y te arranca el misterioso objeto.{/n} «Una creación xenos maldita que puede retorcer la mente, y poco después el cuerpo, de su poseedor. Un objeto sujeto al decreto general de aniquilación total de la Inquisición. Mi autoridad supera su privilegio en este asunto, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "A Halo device." {n}Heinrix reaches out sharply and pries the mysterious object from your hand.{/n} "A cursed xenos creation that twists the mind, and soon the body, of its master. An item subject to the Inquisition's general decree of total annihilation. In this matter, my authority exceeds your privilege, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Un dispositivo Halo». {n}Heinrix extiende su mano y te arranca el misterioso objeto.{/n} «Una creación xenos maldita que puede retorcer la mente, y poco después el cuerpo, de su poseedor. Un objeto sujeto al decreto general de aniquilación total de la Inquisición. Mi autoridad supera su privilegio en este asunto, Lord Capitán».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ein Halogerät." {n}Heinrix entwindet entschlossen das geheimnisvolle Objekt aus deiner Hand.{/n} "Ein verfluchte Xenos-Schöpfung, die den Geist und bald darauf auch den Körper ihres Herrn in ihren Bann zieht. Ein Objekt, das dem allgemeinen Erlass der Inquisition unterliegt, komplett zerstört werden zu müssen. In dieser Angelegenheit übertrifft meine Autorität Euer Privileg, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "A Halo device." {n}Heinrix reaches out sharply and pries the mysterious object from your hand.{/n} "A cursed xenos creation that twists the mind, and soon the body, of its master. An item subject to the Inquisition's general decree of total annihilation. In this matter, my authority exceeds your privilege, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Halogerät." {n}Heinrix entwindet entschlossen das geheimnisvolle Objekt aus deiner Hand.{/n} "Ein verfluchte Xenos-Schöpfung, die den Geist und bald darauf auch den Körper ihres Herrn in ihren Bann zieht. Ein Objekt, das dem allgemeinen Erlass der Inquisition unterliegt, komplett zerstört werden zu müssen. In dieser Angelegenheit übertrifft meine Autorität Euer Privileg, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bir Hale cihazı." {n}Heinrix, bir anda uzanıp elindeki gizemli nesneyi zorla alıyor.{/n} "Sahibinin önce aklını, sonra da bedenini çarpıtan lanetli bir zeno icadı. Engizisyon'un hakkında kesin imha hükmü verdiği eşyalardandır. Bu meselede benim yetkim, senin imtiyazını aşar Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "A Halo device." {n}Heinrix reaches out sharply and pries the mysterious object from your hand.{/n} "A cursed xenos creation that twists the mind, and soon the body, of its master. An item subject to the Inquisition's general decree of total annihilation. In this matter, my authority exceeds your privilege, Lord Captain."
